channel.title: Posts on MinuteMedia
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on MinuteMedia

item.title: Reporting Errors in Production: The type/stack Conflict
item.description: Lately, my team and I started reporting errors to Sentry. I hate to admit it, but only then did I notice that my errors aren’t telling me much at a glance.

item.title: How Monorepo is helping us work better
item.description: As any other mature startup that is moving to its growth stage, we had to rebuild our infrastructure. Our initial infrastructure was a Monolithic application in Ruby on Rails.

item.title: The lost chapter to making your pods successful
item.description: You’ve reached the stage of exploring the option of utilizing the pod structure or maybe you’ve already started it. You’ve reviewed the different guides which talk about processes, structure and efficiency, everything sounds great but you feel like something is missing…
